StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_MilitaryStrike_Description
StringTable.String: Ground troops land and attack. Minimal resistance damage.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_Bombard_Description
StringTable.String: Bombards the planet surface from orbit, potentially destroying buildings, and may even render areas unusable. Moderate resistance damage. Increases pollution.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_Invade_Description
StringTable.String: Invading force goes all-in, risking the entire invasion on one push.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_ManTheGuns_Description
StringTable.String: Surface weapons fire at the invading transports, attempting to take them out of the fight.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_HunkerDown_Description
StringTable.String: Attempt to minimize all incoming damage and last as long as possible. Maybe you'll last long enough for reinforcements to arrive.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_Rally_Description
StringTable.String: Rally your citizens in defense of this world! Has a low chance to regain resistance.
